item.title: STACK the Flags 2022: Hit You With That Challenge Writeup
item.description: A while ago, I participated in GovTech’s STACK the Flags competition. One of the challenges I attempted was Hit You With That, but I didn’t manage to solve it within the duration of the CTF. I gave it a second try after the competition ended, and managed to find the flag with a bit of help. As part of the learning process, here is my attempt at documenting the steps I took to discover the flag.
